short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protects you from accidentally closing in-progress code review comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Currently enabled on GitHub pull requests (github.com) and Chromium code reviews (codereview.chromium.org).

Source code at https://github.com/kalman/chrome-extensions/tree/master/comment-protector
